definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: But in a culture that reveres age, some villagers refer to him dismissively as a "lad".
sentences.chinese: 在尊敬長者的文化中，一些村民對他輕蔑的稱爲青年。

sentences.english: This elderly woman is the matron of her family whom I visited in Beit Hanoun.
sentences.chinese: 拜特漢諾時遇到的，她是家中的長者。

sentences.english: " There are no "masters" in an STO network, but there are "elders".
sentences.chinese: 在STO網絡中沒有“大師”，但是有“年長者”。

sentences.english: He was respectful before his betters.
sentences.chinese: 他在長者之前很是恭敬。

sentences.english: The admission ticket is HK$50 each, students and elderly are entitled to enjoy 50% discount.
sentences.chinese: 入場券每張港幣五十元正，學生和長者半價優惠。

sentences.english: The man nodded courteously and walked past.
sentences.chinese: 長者禮貌地朝我們點頭致意，然後就走開了。

sentences.english: Elderly residents enjoying a quality life style in our estates.
sentences.chinese: 長者住戶在屋苑內享受優質的生活。

sentences.english: When they arrived at dry land, the elder went his own way.
sentences.chinese: 到達陸地後，長者繼續趕路了。

sentences.english: Seniors use the health care system more than anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 而年長者比其他人都要更多的使用醫保系統。

sentences.english: But he tries to find people who are old men, who knew the apostles.
sentences.chinese: 但是他嘗試找到那些長者，那些認識使徒的老人。

sentences.english: Housing Society volunteers refurbish the homes for the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 房協的義工爲長者粉飾家居。

sentences.english: Provides residential services and recreational activities for the elderly in both Hong Kong and throughout mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 爲香港及中國內地的長者提供頤養服務及康樂活動。

sentences.english: He always vilipends the advice of his elders.
sentences.chinese: 他總是輕視長者對他的忠告。

sentences.english: Let the elders go first; younger ones should follow.
sentences.chinese: 要讓長者在前面，幼者跟隨在後。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang is a valued elder.
sentences.chinese: 張先生是一位可尊敬的長者。

sentences.english: Elders are supposed to be revered not dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 長者不該被解僱而要得到尊敬。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
